00048     CDataExchange * aDataExchange

00051     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );

00056 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 BOOL CSelectCommPortDlg::OnInitDialog()
00066 {
00067     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00068     CComboBox * portList = (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_COMPORT_CBO_PORT );
00069     portList->ResetContent();
00070 
00071     std::list<CString> portNames;
00072     SerialPort::getPortList( portNames );
00073 
00074     std::list<CString>::const_iterator iter;
00075     for( iter = portNames.begin(); iter != portNames.end(); iter++ )
00076     {
00077         portList->AddString( iter->GetString() );
00078     }
00079 
00080     portList->SetCurSel( 0 );
00081 
00082     return TRUE;
00083 } /* OnInitDialog() */
00084 
00085 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void CSelectCommPortDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00090 {
00091     UpdateData( TRUE );
00092     CComboBox * portList = (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_COMPORT_CBO_PORT );
00093     CString portName;
00094 
00095     portList->GetLBText( mSelectedPortIndex, portName );
00096     if( SerialPort::getInstance()->init( portName ) )
00097     {
00098         OnOK();
00099     }
00100     else
00101     {
00102         ::MessageBox( m_hWnd, SerialPort::getInstance()->getLastError(), _T("Error"), MB_OK );
00103     }
00104 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
